000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;44       WM_LOCK();
000004  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Lock
;;;45       WM__CHWinModal.hWin = hWin;
000008  480e              LDR      r0,|L1.68|
00000a  8084              STRH     r4,[r0,#4]
;;;46       /* Send a message to the window that it is no longer pressed (WM_TOUCH(0)) 
;;;47          if it is outside the modal area, because otherwise it will not receive this message any more.
;;;48       */
;;;49       if (WM__CHWinLast.hWin) {
00000c  480e              LDR      r0,|L1.72|
00000e  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; WM__CHWinLast
000010  b1a8              CBZ      r0,|L1.62|
;;;50         if (!WM__IsInModalArea(WM__CHWinLast.hWin)) {
000012  490d              LDR      r1,|L1.72|
000014  f9b10004          LDRSH    r0,[r1,#4]  ; WM__CHWinLast
000018  f7fffffe          BL       WM__IsInModalArea
00001c  b978              CBNZ     r0,|L1.62|
;;;51           WM_MESSAGE Msg = {0};
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000020  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000022  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
000024  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
;;;52           Msg.MsgId = WM_TOUCH;
000026  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
000028  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;53           WM__SendPIDMessage(WM__CHWinLast.hWin, &Msg);
00002a  4907              LDR      r1,|L1.72|

;;;54           WM__CHWinLast.hWin = 0;

00003a  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]

00003c  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.62|
;;;56       }
;;;57       WM_UNLOCK();

;;;58     }
000042  bd3e              POP      {r1-r5,pc}
